Items.Title: Oversight - The MTA's plans to alleviate overcrowding on the New York City subway system, its plans to alter the routes of several subway lines and create new subway lines and its unwillingness to hold official public hearings on several route changes that will be of significant impact and duration.
Items.MatterName: MTA's plans to alleviate overcrowding on NYC subways.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate committee of the City Council to hold hearings on the Metropolitan Transportation Authority's plan to severely curtail service between Brooklyn and the Grand Street subway station in Lower Manhattan as a result of repair work to the Manhattan Bridge.
Items.MatterName: Hold Hearing, MTA plan to curtail service between Brooklyn and Grand Street

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to hold public hearings in the communities the "G" train serves, and calling for an independent review of the proposed changes to determine whether or not Queens Plaza Station has the capacity to handle the increases in traffic from both the "G" and the new "V" line.
Items.MatterName: MTA to hold hearings in the communicaties the "G" train serves.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate committee of the City Council to hold hearings on the Metropolitan Transportation Authority's plan to severely curtail service between Brooklyn and the Grand Street subway station in Lower Manhattan as a result of repair work to the Manhattan Bridge.
Items.MatterName: Hold Hearing, MTA plan to curtail service between Brooklyn and Grand Street

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to hold public hearings in the communities the "G" train serves, and calling for an independent review of the proposed changes to determine whether or not Queens Plaza Station has the capacity to handle the increases in traffic from both the "G" and the new "V" line.
Items.MatterName: MTA to hold hearings in the communicaties the "G" train serves.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: DiBrienza, The Speaker (Vallone), Pinkett, Oddo & Linares
